title: Govt approves Rs 12,461 cr support for 31,350 MW hydro power projects
description: The Union Cabinet has approved a Rs 12,461 crore outlay to support the development of 31,350 MW hydropower projects over the next eight years. The scheme, applicable to projects above 25 MW capacity, aims to improve infrastructure and promote investment in the hydro power sector.
